thread.title: Chinese scientists break key barrier by cloning monkeys

title: Chinese scientists break key barrier by cloning monkeys
text:
Chinese scientists break key barrier by cloning monkeys 7:29am GMT - 00:44 
Chinese scientists have for the first time cloned monkeys using the same technique that produced Dolly the sheep two decades ago, breaking a technical barrier that could open the door to copying humans. Jim Drury reports.   
Chinese scientists have for the first time cloned monkeys using the same technique that produced Dolly the sheep two decades ago, breaking a technical barrier that could open the door to copying humans. Jim Drury reports.  //reut.rs/2Dy5grc
